Name: Unusual Negroni
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A very soft rendition of a classic Negroni .
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2011 by Charlotte Voisey, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Unusual Negroni contains 178 calories
